api_list.api_description: This request returns a Static QR Code (standard or custom-designed) encoded with a specified URL

This request returns a Static QR Code (standard or custom-designed) encoded with a Google Maps URL linked to specified map coordinates. When scanned, the QR Code prompts the scanning device to open the URL in a mobile browser or Google Maps mobile application (if installed)

This simple API for Wayback is a test to see if a given url is archived and currenlty accessible in the Wayback Machine. This API is useful for providing a 404 or other error handler which checks Wayback to see if it has an archived copy ready to display. The API can be used as follows:

optional_parameters.name: timestamp
optional_parameters.description: timestamp is the timestamp to look up in Wayback. If not specified, the most recenty available capture in Wayback is returned. The format of the timestamp is 1-14 digits (YYYYMMDDhhmmss)

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: callback is an optional callback which may be specified to produce a JSONP response.

Get SVG Pattern

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description:
Name of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random name if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description:
0.5 to Max Scale of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random scale if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: moveLeft
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 100 ( Default: 0 )

optional_parameters.name: angle
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 360 (Default: Random angle if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: strokeJoin
optional_parameters.description:
round or square 
(Default: round)
Valid only for patterns with Stroke Join as specified at https://pattern.monster/api

optional_parameters.name: moveTop
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 100 ( Default: 0 )

optional_parameters.name: colors
optional_parameters.description:
2 to Max Colors of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
Format: Color1|Color2|Color3|Color4|Color5
At least, two colors are required if specified
(Default: Random colors if not specified)
Accepted color values: 
CSS colors ( eg. aqua, red )
RGB or RGBA colors ( eg. rgb(59,130,246), rgba(234,179,8,0.7) )
HSL or HSLA colors ( eg. hsl(300, 76%, 72%), hsla(147,50%,47%,0.5) )
HEX colors without the hash symbol ( eg. E11D48, 2563eb )

optional_parameters.name: spacing
optional_parameters.description:
Horizontal Spacing | Vertical Spacing
(Default: 0|0)
Max Spacing of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
Valid only for patterns with Max Spacing other than 0|0

optional_parameters.name: stroke
optional_parameters.description:
0.5 to Max Stroke of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random stroke if not specified)
Valid only for patterns with Mode as Stroke

api_list.api_description: Get videos relevant for a given query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The user's search query string

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

optional_parameters.name: mkt
optional_parameters.description:
The market where the results come from. Typically, this is the country where the user is making the request from; however, it could be a different country if the user is not located in a country where Bing delivers results. The market must be in the form -. For example, en-US.

Full list of supported markets:
es-AR, en-AU, de-AT, nl-BE, fr-BE, pt-BR, en-CA, fr-CA, es-CL, da-DK, fi-FI, fr-FR, de-DE, zh-HK, en-IN, en-ID, en-IE, it-IT, ja-JP, ko-KR, en-MY, es-MX, nl-NL, en-NZ, no-NO, zh-CN, pl-PL, pt-PT, en-PH, ru-RU, ar-SA, en-ZA, es-ES, sv-SE, fr-CH, de-CH, zh-TW, tr-TR, en-GB, en-US, es-US

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of video results to return in the response. The actual number delivered may be less than requested.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The zero-based offset that indicates the number of video results to skip before returning results.

api_list.api_description: Get insights about a video, such as related videos.

required_parameters.name: modules
required_parameters.default: A comma-delimited list of one or more insights to request.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.default: An ID that uniquely identifies a video. The Video object's videoId field contains the ID that you set this parameter to.

api_list.api_description: Capture screenshot from any URL or Raw HTML. POST method is also available. Please take a look https://restpack.io/screenshot/docs

optional_parameters.name: html
optional_parameters.description:
Raw HTML string of a page that you want to capture. Example:

Test

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Return a JSON response with the resulting image's URL instead of the image itself. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Capturing mode. Please see below for details. Default: fullpage Pattern: fullpage | viewport | element

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Preferred image output format. If you need a raw html string you can pass html as format Default: png Pattern: jpg | png | pdf | html

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Preferred viewport width in pixels. Default: 1280 Min: 320 Max: 2000

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Preferred viewport height in pixels. Default: 1024 Min: 160

optional_parameters.name: thumbnail_width
optional_parameters.description: In case you want a thumbnail image, provide a preferred width. Min: 10 Max: 3000

optional_parameters.name: thumbnail_height
optional_parameters.description: Preferred thumbnail height, requires thumbnail_width to be set, unbounded if omitted. Min: 10 Max: 3000

optional_parameters.name: css
optional_parameters.description: Additional CSS string to be injected into the page before render.

optional_parameters.name: js
optional_parameters.description: Additional JS string to be injected into the page before render.

optional_parameters.name: prescroll
optional_parameters.description: Force scrolling the webpage before capture. Might help with dynamic loading assets.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Time in milliseconds to delay capture after page load. Default: 2000 Max: 10000

optional_parameters.name: ttl
optional_parameters.description: Time in milliseconds for the resulting image to be cached for further requests. Default: 1 day Max: 1 week

optional_parameters.name: fresh
optional_parameters.description: Force rendering a new screenshot disregarding the cache status. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: user_agent
optional_parameters.description: Custom user-agent header string for the web request. Default: Chrome Compatible User Agent

optional_parameters.name: accept_language
optional_parameters.description: Custom accept-language header string for the web request.

optional_parameters.name: element_selector
optional_parameters.description: A CSS selector to be used with element rendering mode.

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: Additional headers seperated with newline Example: X-Test: header\nAccept-Type: html

optional_parameters.name: retina
optional_parameters.description: Generate retina sized screen capture (2x device pixel ratio). Default: false

optional_parameters.name: base64
optional_parameters.description: Serialize response file to base64

optional_parameters.name: access_token
optional_parameters.description: You can provide your token via querystring instead of header.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL of web page, including the protocol that you want to capture.

api_list.api_description: shorten url  url= url-wan't shorten &custom= your custom name& private= if wan't be public them 0 if private them 1http://ulvis.net/api/write/post

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The url you want to shrink.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: esponse type (json|xml). optional, default: json.

optional_parameters.name: custom
optional_parameters.description: Custom name

optional_parameters.name: private
optional_parameters.description: Set url to private (not listed) (1 or 0)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Adds a signature to track your application

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Set url password

optional_parameters.name: uses
optional_parameters.description: Number of uses for the url

api_list.api_description: You can use this for moive search
scrape data from various torrent websites such as 1337x
for piratebay

Tier 2 proxies

Each proxy returned costs 1 credit


With our /v1/tier2 endpoint you can set different parameters for proxies that you need.

You can set type which is just your proxy type, either HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS4, SOCKS5, CONNECT:25 (which is smtp proxy)

for limit set an integer that will tell us how many proxies you will need. Our users usually set a limit to avoid using too many credits.

With latency you can set an integer which will filter out all proxies that have a latency higher then specified.

ssl is a boolean parameter, you can filter out proxies that support ssl or don't

is_anonymous is also a boolean statemet where you can filter anonymous proxies

country is a parameter that you can use to set a country that you want.

Get random proxy,

choose type and country

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS4, SOCKS5, CONNECT:25

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: You can specify a country for a proxy that you want to be returened

api_list.api_description:
List our tier 1 proxies with filters
This proxies are more comprehensively checked


You can set type which is just your proxy type, either HTTP, HTTPS

for limit set an integer that will tell us how many proxies you will need. Our users usually set a limit to avoid using too many credits.

With latency you can set an integer which will filter out all proxies that have a latency higher then specified.

ssl is a boolean parameter, you can filter out proxies that support ssl or don't

is_anonymous is also a boolean statemet where you can filter anonymous proxies

country is a parameter that you can use to set a country that you want.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS4, SOCKS5, CONNECT:25

optional_parameters.name: latency
optional_parameters.description: ms latency for a proxy, everything that is below that value is returned

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: You can specify a country for a proxy that you want to be returened

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of proxies returned, helps you control how many credits can be used

api_list.api_description: Get SVG Pattern

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description:
Name of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random name if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description:
0.5 to Max Scale of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random scale if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: moveLeft
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 100 ( Default: 0 )

optional_parameters.name: angle
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 360 (Default: Random angle if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: strokeJoin
optional_parameters.description:
round or square 
(Default: round)
Valid only for patterns with Stroke Join as specified at https://pattern.monster/api

optional_parameters.name: moveTop
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 100 ( Default: 0 )

optional_parameters.name: colors
optional_parameters.description:
2 to Max Colors of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
Format: Color1|Color2|Color3|Color4|Color5
At least, two colors are required if specified
(Default: Random colors if not specified)
Accepted color values: 
CSS colors ( eg. aqua, red )
RGB or RGBA colors ( eg. rgb(59,130,246), rgba(234,179,8,0.7) )
HSL or HSLA colors ( eg. hsl(300, 76%, 72%), hsla(147,50%,47%,0.5) )
HEX colors without the hash symbol ( eg. E11D48, 2563eb )

optional_parameters.name: spacing
optional_parameters.description:
Horizontal Spacing | Vertical Spacing
(Default: 0|0)
Max Spacing of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
Valid only for patterns with Max Spacing other than 0|0

optional_parameters.name: stroke
optional_parameters.description:
0.5 to Max Stroke of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random stroke if not specified)
Valid only for patterns with Mode as Stroke

optional_parameters.description: Results per page. Allowed values 1-100, default is 25.
